question: What factors influence users' initial adoption of the system?
whyChanged: Too broad; needed to separate adoption from continuance
supervisoryFeedback: Consider distinguishing pre-adoption (TAM) from post-adoption (ECM) factors.

question: How do confirmation and perceived usefulness jointly influence continuance intention in voluntary IS contexts?
whyChanged: Focused on post-adoption based on ECM framework
supervisoryFeedback: Good focus. Add consideration of boundary conditions.
